metadata.title: CVE-2019-3866 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An information-exposure vulnerability was discovered whereopenstack-mistral's undercloud log files containing clear-text informationwere made world readable. A malicious system user could exploit this flawto access sensitive user information.

criterions.comment: mistral package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
